entries.description: UX: Add progress notification when connecting to AWS
SAM run/debug: fail early so that build/invoke errors are more obvious #1689
CDK: search for CDK projects up to 2 levels deep (previously 1)
CDK: menu includes standard items if AWS view is hidden
Skip auto-connect until AWS Explorer is shown #1433
Toggle CodeLenses via "AWS: Toggle SAM hints in source files" command
SAM run/debug: Add support for Go 1.x
UX: write logs to extension's 'globalStoragePath' for all operating systems #1692
Create aws-sam debug configurations via Command Palette using the `AWS: Add SAM Debug Configuration` command
Settings: remove "Enable CDK Explorer" option (VSCode has built-in support for showing/hiding panels already)
